readable.title: 2294688426_96c8614f1d
readable.content: A man dressed in a black poncho stands in the middle of a parking lot . A man wearing a black sweatshirt poses for a picture in a parking lot . A man with a beard , dressed in black , is smoking . A mean wearing a black hooded sweatshirt smokes a cigarette at the side of a road . The man in the robe has gold on his beard .
